wikipedia_page.main: John Daniel Taylor (27 January 1872 – 21 February 1949) was a Scottish professional footballer.

response: *Jack Taylor (1890s pitcher) (1873–1900), aka "Brewery Jack", baseball player
*Jack Taylor (footballer, born 1872) (1872–1949), Scottish footballer (John Daniel Taylor)
*Jack Taylor (referee) (1930–2012), real name John, English football referee
* 27 January – Jack Taylor (d. 1949), Scotland international forward in four matches (1892–1895); made 400 appearances for Everton (1896–1910), scoring 80 goals.
